name: Goblin
description: A small, mischievous creature with a penchant for stealing.

name: Orc Warrior
description: A fierce and brutish orc, armed with a crude battleaxe.

name: Skeleton Archer
description: An undead archer, firing arrows from a distance.

name: Troll
description: A hulking troll with tough skin and regenerative powers.

name: Dragon
description: A fearsome dragon, breathing fire and guarding a treasure hoard.
